title: FS: 1887 Old Judge Cigarettes N172 Ned Williamson SGC 70 EX+ 5.5
author: wake.up.the.echoes

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Old Judge Cigarettes N172 Ned Williamson SGC 70 EX+ 5.5
posts.post_content:
I have a 1887 Old Judge Cigarettes N172 Ned Williamson SGC 70 EX+ 5.5 for sale.  Card is sold

If this card looks familiar to you, it should, as I just bought it off the B/S/T on June 25 (Excellent transaction, btw, Doug. Thank you!) for $450. As usual, I got excited and purchased a card that I probably shouldn't have purchased. It's a little too much card for me at the moment. It really shouldn't have been the first OJ I ever purchased! It's like needing a car and buying a brand new Lexus, when a used 1993 Honda Civic would have sufficed. I am selling this so I can complete my Jerry Denny player/pose run (in lesser condition). I paid $450, and I would like to sell it for $450 OBO (via PAYPAL ONLY, please -- to protect both of us). I will eat the shipping (insured - signature - express via USPS), and I will ship within 24 hours, and send your tracking information immediately. If someone would like to make an offer, feel free to send a PM. See scans below. Thanks.    Card is sold.

Alan.   Card is sold.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/thebeautifulgame/forsaleortrade/websize/WilliamsonOJFront001.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/thebeautifulgame/forsaleortrade/websize/WilliamsonOJBack001.jpg[/IMG]

One friendly bump before this hits ebay this afternoon. $400 (shipping included).

Thanks.
Alan
Sent you a PM yesterday I'll take it..

Doug,
I didn't receive your PM yesterday, but I did receive today's. Worked out for you as you saved $50!! :)

Card is yours. Consider it sold pending payment. See Pm for payment instructions.

Alan

[quote name="bbcard1" post=1157179]that is a beauty...[/QUOTE]

Agreed.

A little too much card for me, but I am sure the buyer will enjoy it! (In case you are reading this Doug, I shipped your card this morning. I will PM you your tracking information.) Alan
